summary.title: Summary
summary.description: As a web developer, my goals are to create online digital interactions for users that are visually appealing, engaging and standards compliant. It is my passion to fully utilize skills gained through education, corporate employment & entrepreneurial endeavors in challenging environments that thrive on engagement of creative, outside-the-box ideas, methods and processes.

details.skill_data: JavaScript, Bash, RegEx, C, C++, Java
HTML, CSS, AngularJS, Angular 4-10, SASS/LESS, NgRX, JQuery, Bootstrap, Wordpress, React, REST
Git, SVN, JIRA, Slack, Sketch, Jenkins

job_duties: Working closely with UX and back-end Developers on daily basis to discuss design and requirements
Design, build, and implement applications that drive functionality and optimize front end performance
Apply understanding of Angular frameworks to implement and productize components as specified by the product owner
Apply knowledge of UI Development (HTML, CSS, JavaScript, TypeScript) to understand client configuration demands and fulfill them by code modification if needed
Apply experience with Angular 8+ to support legacy clients and backward port some critical new features
Use Javascript to build and deliver all Angular work and maintain legacy code
Working with Restful APIs to efficiently communicate with all back end systems and sometimes client systems to get, list, and update UI state
Working in an agile environment with an excellent team of engineers
Constantly communicating with product managers, clients and co-workers to ensure effectiveness and precision in the website
workEx.skills: Skills used: Angular 9/10, Sass, HTML, CSS, flexbox, Gitlab, NgRX, Jira, Jasmine, Karma, JavaScript, TypeScript

job_duties: Initiated application of digital path to ease the daily operations for multi-million dollar clients
Conceptualized and designed user interface mockup-ups wih UX
Connectetd with clients and support teams to ideate and prioritize projects
Designed system components and delivered requirements to engineering teams
Oversaw the redesign of front-end components to use RxJS and Redux
Designing system components and delivered requirements to engineering teams
Overseeing the redesign of front-end components to use Angular
Worked with testing frameworks such as Jasmine, karma and Cucumber
Worked in Agile team to estimate, plan and develop the product to deliver it before expectations. Retrospective approach was additional learning in Agile.
workEx.skills: Skills used: Angular 8, Sass, HTML, flexbox, Bamboo, Git, Bit bucket, Gatekeeper, NgRX, Jira, Jasmine, Karma and Cucumber

job_duties: Developed highly scalable real time application using HTML, CSS, JavaScript and frameworks like AngularJS and Angular 2+
Used knwoledge of when to use front-end software design patterns such as asynchronicity, data binding, modules, MVC & promises
Worked with testing frameworks such as Jasmine and karma
Demonstrated knowledge of continuous integration of frameworks and tools like Jenkins to deploy and GIT/SVN to version control
Programmed the application using pre-processors like SASS and LESS, libraries like Bootstrap and Flex-box to make it responsive on all devices
Developed customized solutions to support critical business functions for multiple clients satisfying their meets and goals
Built software for continuously maintaining and improving these systems
Oversaw legacy code migration and improvement of code quality
Demonstrated knowledge of continuous integration of frameworks and tools like Jenkins to deploy and GIT/SVN to version control

job_duties: Integrated a real-time social content delivery platform into customers' websites
Identified bugs and worked with developers to improve system architecture
Collected client feedback and determined long-term value and cost-effectiveness of change requests

built an efficient relationship between students and alumni using HTML, CSS grid, REST and media queries
